subject: Hockey, Ice
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: Alex Ovechkin and Russia lost in the quarterfinals in Sochi, and his Washington teammate Nicklas Backstrom was pulled before Sweden’s gold medal loss for a failed doping test.
snippet: Alex Ovechkin and Russia lost in the quarterfinals in Sochi, and his Washington teammate Nicklas Backstrom was pulled before Sweden’s gold medal loss for a failed doping test.
